mapper.select: SELECT LAST.HOUR , SUM(LAST.GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR) AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR , SUM(LAST.GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR) AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR , SUM(LAST.PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR) AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR FROM ( SELECT STAT.hour AS HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR FROM ( SELECT DATA.HOUR AS hour , R.role_name AS role_name , DATA.EVENT_STATUS AS event_status , DATA.DATA_CNT AS data_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) AS HOUR , role_code AS ROLE_CODE , event_status AS EVENT_STATUS , SUM(event_cnt) AS DATA_CNT FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H WHERE SUBSTRING(occu_time, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) AND SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) IN (7, 8, 9) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) , role_code , event_status ) DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON DATA.ROLE_CODE = r.role_code WHERE R.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근', '고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근', '풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') ) STAT GROUP BY STAT.hour , STAT.role_name , STAT.event_status ) LAST GROUP BY LAST.HOUR ORDER BY LAST.HOUR

SELECT SUM(LAST.GIMPO_IN_24COUNT) AS GIMPO_IN_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT) AS GIMPO_OUT_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON24COUNT) AS GOCHON_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON1_24COUNT) AS GOCHON1_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON2_24COUNT) AS GOCHON2_COUNT , SUM(LAST.PUNGMU24COUNT) AS PUNGMU_COUNT FROM ( SELECT STAT.hour AS HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_IN_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '-1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-역사입구1') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON1_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-역사입구2') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON2_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS PUNGMU24COUNT FROM ( SELECT DATA.HOUR AS hour , R.role_name AS role_name , DATA.EVENT_STATUS AS event_status , DATA.DATA_CNT AS data_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) AS HOUR , role_code AS ROLE_CODE , event_status AS EVENT_STATUS , SUM(event_cnt) AS DATA_CNT FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H WHERE SUBSTRING(occu_time, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) AND SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) IN (7, 8, 9) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) , role_code , event_status ) DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON DATA.ROLE_CODE = r.role_code ) STAT GROUP BY STAT.hour , STAT.role_name , STAT.event_status ) LAST

SELECT LAST.HOUR , SUM(LAST.GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR) AS GIMPO_IN_CHANGE , SUM(LAST.GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR) AS GOCHON_CHANGE , SUM(LAST.PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR) AS PUNGMU_CHANGE FROM ( SELECT STAT.hour AS HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR FROM ( SELECT DATA.HOUR AS hour , R.role_name AS role_name , DATA.EVENT_STATUS AS event_status , DATA.DATA_CNT AS data_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) AS HOUR , role_code AS ROLE_CODE , event_status AS EVENT_STATUS , SUM(event_cnt) AS DATA_CNT FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H WHERE SUBSTRING(occu_time, 1, 8) = #{occuDate} AND SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) IN (7, 8, 9) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) , role_code , event_status ) DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON DATA.ROLE_CODE = r.role_code WHERE R.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근', '고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근', '풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') ) STAT GROUP BY STAT.hour , STAT.role_name , STAT.event_status ) LAST GROUP BY LAST.HOUR ORDER BY LAST.HOUR

SELECT SUM(LAST.GIMPO_IN_24COUNT) AS GIMPO_IN_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT) AS GIMPO_OUT_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON24COUNT) AS GOCHON_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON1_24COUNT) AS GOCHON1_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON2_24COUNT) AS GOCHON2_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.PUNGMU24COUNT) AS PUNGMU_CHANGE_COUNT FROM ( SELECT STAT.hour AS HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_IN_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '-1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-역사입구1') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON1_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-역사입구2') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON2_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS PUNGMU24COUNT FROM ( SELECT DATA.HOUR AS hour , R.role_name AS role_name , DATA.EVENT_STATUS AS event_status , DATA.DATA_CNT AS data_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) AS HOUR , role_code AS ROLE_CODE , event_status AS EVENT_STATUS , SUM(event_cnt) AS DATA_CNT FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H WHERE SUBSTRING(occu_time, 1, 8) = #{occuDate} AND SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) IN (7, 8, 9) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) , role_code , event_status ) DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON DATA.ROLE_CODE = r.role_code -- WHERE R.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근', '고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근', '풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') ) STAT GROUP BY STAT.hour , STAT.role_name , STAT.event_status ) LAST

SELECT TOP 1 object_class FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON H.role_code = R.role_code WHERE OCCU_TIME < CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) + REPLACE(CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') AND R.role_name LIKE '%풍무%' AND(R.role_name LIKE '%군중%' OR R.role_name LIKE '%밀집%' OR R.role_name LIKE '%crowd%') AND R.role_name LIKE '%1' ORDER BY occu_time DESC

SELECT TOP 1 object_class FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON H.role_code = R.role_code WHERE OCCU_TIME < CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) + REPLACE(CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') AND R.role_name LIKE '%풍무%' AND(R.role_name LIKE '%군중%' OR R.role_name LIKE '%밀집%' OR R.role_name LIKE '%crowd%') AND R.role_name LIKE '%2' ORDER BY occu_time DESC

SELECT TOP 1 object_class FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON H.role_code = R.role_code WHERE OCCU_TIME < CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) + REPLACE(CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') AND R.role_name LIKE '%고촌%' AND(R.role_name LIKE '%군중%' OR R.role_name LIKE '%밀집%' OR R.role_name LIKE '%crowd%') AND R.role_name LIKE '%1' ORDER BY occu_time DESC

SELECT TOP 1 object_class FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON H.role_code = R.role_code WHERE OCCU_TIME < CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) + REPLACE(CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') AND R.role_name LIKE '%고촌%' AND(R.role_name LIKE '%군중%' OR R.role_name LIKE '%밀집%' OR R.role_name LIKE '%crowd%') AND R.role_name LIKE '%2' ORDER BY occu_time DESC
